Title: VeggieTales: Abe and the Amazing Promise
Writer: Tod Carter (developer), Tim Hodge, Mike Nawrocki, Brian Roberts (developer), Sean Roche, Mark Steele, Phil Vischer (story), John Wahba (developer), J. Chris Wall (developer)
Actors: Phil Vischer, Mike Nawrocki, Lisa Vischer, Delilah
Plot: Abe and the Amazing Promise is a Veggie-spun Bible classic that tells the story of Abraham and Sarah and their wait for a promised child. Bob the Tomato responds to a fan's letter about "...
